To cook this dish, preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Arrange the fish and potatoes in a single layer on a baking tray. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Bake for 25 minutes or until the potatoes are tender and the fish is cooked through.

Fish and potatoes can be cooked together by baking or roasting in the oven. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Place the potatoes in a baking dish and season with salt, pepper, and any desired herbs and spices. Place the fish on top of the potatoes. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Bake for 20-25 minutes until the fish is cooked through and the potatoes are tender.
